decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The developments to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The extract ductwork hearby approved shall be fitted with carbon filters or other form of odour control system, details of which shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The ductwork shall terminate vertically at least 1 metre above eaves level as indicated on drawing No. J214/01 and no obstruction or cowl shall be fitted above the extract opening. The extract ducting shall be completed in accordance with the approved details to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority prior to commencement of its use.

Reason for condition: To safegaurd the amenity of the occupiers of neighbouring properties.

Condition : 3 - The ductwork shall be fitted with flexible couplings and mountings between the ductwork and the walls and the fan unit.

Reason for condition: To safeguard the amenity of adjioning residents.

Condition : 4 - The sound presure level from the extract fan and ductwork should not increase the background noise level by more than 2dB(a) L90 (5 minutes) when measured 1m from the nearest noise sensitive property.

Reason for condition: To ensure a satisfactory standard of residential amenity for  occupiers of neighbouring properties.
description: ADDITIONAL KITCHEN EXTRACT DUCTWORK TO REAR OF BUILDING.
